message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at a price of $11000. I understand its value to you is $12000, but I hope this offer presents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me see if I can adjust the price to accommodate your needs. My counteroffer is $10500 for the product.
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10000
